sent.orig: Simplifying assumptions are introduced whenever expedient, and generalizations are made whenever practical.
sent.trans: 每当有利时就引入简化假设，每当有效果时就进行推广。

sent.orig: Practice in minutes, whenever you can find them-five or ten before school, after lunch, between chores.
sent.trans: 你一有空闲时间，就练上几分钟---在上学之前、午饭过后和琐事杂务的间隙，都可以练上5或10分钟。

sent.orig: You are the shelter that I turn to whenever I'm in trouble.
sent.trans: 当我遇到麻烦时，您是我庇护的港湾。

sent.orig: I get cold feet whenever I have to speak in front of a crowd.
sent.trans: 每当我必须在群众面前说话时，我都会手脚发冷。

sent.orig: These contacts and negotiations become more frequent whenever the Japanese intensify their offensives.
sent.trans: 特别是在日寇进攻紧急的时候，这种联系和谈判就来得越多。
